attributes.action: allow homeowners to attack any burglar caught inside their home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Homeowners are only allowed to defend their home if they believe the burglar is going to attack them. 
Why should someone who illegally enters my home have any rights at all? 

I'm not suggesting we should be allowed to shoot anyone who enters my house but if I fight & injure a burglar then I should not be sued by them.
